channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Black Friday is here, but so is inflation. How should shoppers budget?
item.description: With Inflation and an unpredictable economy, Christmas shopping might look different this season. Washington Post financial columnist Michelle Singletary talks about families can navigate things.
item.content:encoded: With Inflation and an unpredictable economy, Christmas shopping might look different this season. Washington Post financial columnist Michelle Singletary talks about families can navigate things.
item.dc:creator: Vincent Acovino

item.title: Here to Help: Thanksgiving Edition
item.description: From building homes to filling pantries to re-enacting medieval history for middle-schoolers – yes, you read that right – acts of volunteerism have remained vital for communities across the country.
item.content:encoded: From building homes to filling pantries to re-enacting medieval history for middle-schoolers – yes, you read that right – acts of volunteerism have remained vital for communities across the country.
item.dc:creator: Matt Ozug

item.title: Pope Leo is traveling to Turkey and Lebanon on the first foreign trip of his papacy
item.description: This Thanksgiving, Pope Leo is making his first overseas trip as pontiff. He started in Turkey, where he called for tolerance between different peoples and religions.
item.content:encoded: This Thanksgiving, Pope Leo is making his first overseas trip as pontiff. He started in Turkey, where he called for tolerance between different peoples and religions.
item.dc:creator: Ruth Sherlock

item.title: There's reason to be optimistic about the the movies coming this holiday season
item.description: A selective preview of the comedies, action adventures, dramas and awards contenders Hollywood has in store between Thanksgiving and the end of 2025.
item.content:encoded: A selective preview of the comedies, action adventures, dramas and awards contenders Hollywood has in store between Thanksgiving and the end of 2025.
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: The Afghan resettlement effort faces a defining test after the DC shooting
item.description: Haris Tarin, vice president of the Muslim Public Affairs Council, outlines how the alleged DC shooter was vetted and what it means for Afghan immigration to the U.S.
item.content:encoded: Haris Tarin, vice president of the Muslim Public Affairs Council, outlines how the alleged DC shooter was vetted and what it means for Afghan immigration to the U.S.
item.dc:creator: Kai McNamee

item.title: Federal officials probe alleged D.C. shooter's ties to Afghanistan's CIA and military
item.description: Officials are conducting a "coast-to-coast" investigation into the shooting of two National Guard members in Washington, D.C., the FBI head said. The suspect had worked with the CIA in Afghanistan.
item.content:encoded: Officials are conducting a "coast-to-coast" investigation into the shooting of two National Guard members in Washington, D.C., the FBI head said. The suspect had worked with the CIA in Afghanistan.
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: It's not easy to get a Thanksgiving turkey in Moscow, Russia. But it's possible
item.description: Thanksgiving is of course a very American holiday. What, though, is an American overseas at this time of year to do — specially when it comes to eating turkey?
item.content:encoded: Thanksgiving is of course a very American holiday. What, though, is an American overseas at this time of year to do — specially when it comes to eating turkey?
item.dc:creator: Charles Maynes

item.title: Jiffy corn muffin mix is a Thanksgiving staple made by a 137-year-old company
item.description: Jiffy corn muffins are an iconic pantry staple that's been a part of family dinners for 75 years. Thanksgiving is peak season for the company, which has been run by the same family for five generation
item.content:encoded: Jiffy corn muffins are an iconic pantry staple that's been a part of family dinners for 75 years. Thanksgiving is peak season for the company, which has been run by the same family for five generation
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Writer Suleika Jaouad shares how she stays connected to people she's lost
item.description: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Writer Suleika Jaouad talks about how she stays connected to people she's lost.
item.content:encoded: On Wild Card, well-known guests answer the kinds of questions we often think about but don't talk about. Writer Suleika Jaouad talks about how she stays connected to people she's lost.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Martin

item.title: The evolutionary history of kissing, moss in space, and the origins of the moon
item.description: Emily Kwong and Regina Barber of NPR's Short Wave podcast talk about the evolutionary history of kissing, how moss spores fare in space, and new clues about the collision that created the moon.
item.content:encoded: Emily Kwong and Regina Barber of NPR's Short Wave podcast talk about the evolutionary history of kissing, how moss spores fare in space, and new clues about the collision that created the moon.
item.dc:creator: Emily Kwong
